meanings.definition: A type of shrimp or prawn.
meanings.sent1: The gambas were small and tasty.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a plate of gambas for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The gambas danced in the pan as they cooked.
meanings.sent4: The gambas were like little jewels on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The fresh gambas glistened in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A dish made with shrimp or prawns.
meanings.sent1: The gambas dish was spicy and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: They shared a delicious plate of gambas.
meanings.sent3: The gambas dish was so good, it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the gambas dish filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling sound of the gambas dish was music to her ears.
